backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining salon, booking, image, and user profile types with seeded sample data and integrated access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two build features affecting AppV1.jsx and associated components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing behavior and purpose of all major frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base definitions with OKLCH color variables and global light/dark theme styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the root React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Thin wrapper that simply renders AppV1.
frontend/src/AppV1.jsx: Large React component implementing Swiss geo intelligence, preset-rich salon logic, and a full V51 UI system.

frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating authenticated or anonymous backend actors and autoâ€‘refreshing related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Comprehensive Internet Identity provider and hook managing auth state, login flow, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for backend query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalonImage.ts: Empty placeholder file intended for salon image upload/retrieval logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables, utility classes, scrollbar hiding, safe-area padding, and numerous animation keyframes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider, importing global styles and rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/auraGenerator.ts: Generates marketing-style text descriptions for salons based on category, type, tags, and city.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors mapped to CSS variables, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes the project's versioned state, redesign plans, architecture resets, and known issues.
